reviews.review:
Portal１もプレイしたが、2はパズル、ジョーク、ストーリー、演出、
すべてがパワーアップしている。さらにCOOPもついている。
買って損無し、とてもエキサイティングだし、前作みたいにもう終わり？と思わせない。
久しぶりに言える　神ゲー　である。
The best game i've ever played, I strongly recommend you buy Portal 1 and 2.
Portal  really rocks ! Tremendous !
Good game boss , get it.
Best game of the century, IMO.

It's Portal.



Two.
good shit

¡Sublime! Es mucho más largo que el anterior, más divertido, más profundo. Sus dos campañas, individual y cooperativa, se complementan de un modo increíble. El modo "Co-op" es fascinante, aunque preferible al jugarlo con un amigo. En definitiva, mi título favorito de Valve con diferencia.
It's like having an anal orgy but instead of anal it's portal
It's made by VALVE SOFTWARE... what more can you want?!

Holy shit! Game of the Year! Possibly the Lustrum!
imdbScore 8.5/10
...vskutku povedena gamesa z Black Mesa :) ... doporucuji vsem ... i tem co se zmuzou jen na torent :D fakt to stoji za to .))
Naprostá herní nirvána!Must have pro každého kdo to s hraním myslí vážně.
Now your thinking with Portals.   Bloody fantastic game, Valve does it again.

前回の続編ということで、引き続き同じ被験者がテストを受けることに。
（詳細はコミック参照）
オープニングから衝撃の展開でかなり感情移入できます。


ラストは・・びっくりするサプライズです。仕方ないね。

謎解き要素もさらに複雑になって、前作よりも難しくなっています。
ストーリ、キャラクター。ともに面白かったです。購入して損はしません。

''...I think we can put our differences behind us. For science. You monster." 

Portal (2) is an AMAZING AMAZING AMAZING AMAZING AMAZING AMAZING AMAZING AMAZING and naturally AWESOME game!
Experience the fun and totally insane side of science now! 

(dizziness, fainting and vomiting is allowed at all times)

<3 GLaDOS
PERFECT. 100/100. One of the best games ever made. Other words are unnecessary. P.S.: Half-Life 2 is still the best game ever made, but I am completely fine with that. :P
Phun!
I was never a huge fan of Portal, and this is probably one of the best games ever made. The characters, the voicing, the pacing and gameplay mechanics, everything is perfect.
SPAAAAACEEEE, SO MUCH SPACE I MUST SEE IT ALL, SPAACE, WE ARE IN SPACEEEE, IS THIS?... SPAAAAAAAAAAAACEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE...
Play it.
Another brilliant addition to the gaming world by Valve, proving that you don't need combat to make a first person shooter fun.

simplesmente o melhor jogo que eu ja joguei, duvido que saia algum jogo melhor (pelo menos nos proximos 2 anos). Emoção do inicio ao fim, o jogo é epico, ação constante exelentes graficos, incrivel jogabilidade isso tudo sem contar com a extraordinaria historia derivada do univerço de half-life esse é um jogo inesquecivel e se eu desse uma nota pra ele provavelmente seria 100! portal 2 é o jogo do ano disso eu nao tenho duvidas. se voce nao tem ainda nao faz idéia do que esta perdendo :D

Portal 2 is a masterpiece. Plain and simple. Elements of humorous and clever dialouge, challenging puzzles, deep co-op, adrenaline pumping scenarios and a strong ending are all mixed in into this masterpiece salad. A stronger title than its predecessor by a long shot, and that's saying A LOT.

It is a game worthy of anyone's purchase. It's a must have, do not pass it up.
Incredible!

This is one of those games that you just have to play.
The CO-OP mode is just awesome and wish i could see more games utilizing this feature.
I would give this a vote for GAME OF THE YEAR

Incredibly, even better (and funnier!) than the first Portal.

Play with headphones, or a good speaker system.  The sound/music design is exceptional.

I'm having so much fun, I'm forcing myself to play in small, bite-size chunks, because I don't want it to end!  (I'm not done yet.)

The game rewards exploration.  One hidden area had me laughing with delight to the point of tears.  I'm getting a big stupid grin on my face just thinking about it again.

A must-play.  Period.

EXCELLENT GAME! A worthy sequel to its predecessor. the multiplayer is fun and inventive too.

overall - 5/5

Muito difícil achar algum defeito em Portal 2. É facilmente um dos melhores jogos já feitos e provavelmente o melhor da história da Valve. Excelente roteiro, diálogos geniais e engraçados, personagens bem desenvolvidos, jogabilidade inteligente e impecável, trilha sonora épica, modo cooperativo que vale cada segundo e a Source Engine na sua melhor forma. É realmente uma obra de arte.
Celui qui aime le coop, ce jeu est pour vous !!!!
FUCK YEAH PORTAL!
fucking. awesome.

Single Player is fun and challenging towards the end, story is awesome, multiplayer is too fun.

Story is the best part about portal.  You get to find out the history behind GLaDOS, how Aperture Science got started, and a new companion that tags along to reveal a twist in the story.

An epic tale of love, loss, revenge, friendship, narrow escapes, killer robots, death-defying stunts, funny accents, EVEN MORE revenge, black humor, sheer lunacy, and SPAAAAACE!

There were probably some portals in there as well.  

Possibly.
Funniest game ever. Stop reading and start playing. You monster.

A great game that expands upon the quality of the original with new features such as faith plates, repulsion gels, excursion funnels, and so much more. Portal 2 is an amazing product which offers more bang for your buck than the original with a longer single player story and adds on to that with a seperate cooperative story. It's a brilliant game that doesn't require shooting bad guys but just good old puzzle solving with elements of humour from excellent dialogue and voice acting. Buy this if you've got the money to spend. This purchase will be one you won't regret.
Single player is even more fun that the first one.
play it

Don't let the haters tell ya differently. This is a game that takes everything set up by the first one and delivers it in a bigger and better while by constantly adding new elements. It is another masterpiece from Valve worth every penny. In fact, just the finale is worth the price of admission.
Beautiful Artworks, the most creative game ever released. Must have!

A perfect game. The puzzles and gameplay are superb, the plot and character development are very well-done, the graphics done by Source 2011 are great and the soundtrack is excellent. Even though the single-player campaign is "short" (I got 8.5 hours out of it, but others got less, so your mileage may vary.), the pre-order was completely worth it.

Like I said, a perfect game. :-)

Witziger Dialoge und erstklassige Rätsel. Hier braucht man Grips und Verstand, um in den Testkammern zu bestehen.

Neben den tollen Singleplayer bietet der 2 player Coop-Modus doppelten Spaß und Grips. Eine Tolle Spielerfahrung, die Beweist, dass ein Shooter nicht immer Waffen und Ballerei bestritten wird. Eure Größte Waffe ist eurer Kopf. Schaut euch die Testkammern an, Analysiert die Möglichkeiten und besteht den Test.

Absolute Kaufempfehlung, Der Singleplayer zieht einen in seinen Bann und der Coop Modus macht soviel spaß, dass man nicht mehr aufhören möchte.

For Portal veterans, Portal 2 will probably feel around the same length as the original Portal, thus it'll probably feel short. I certainly felt it was over a bit too soon. Fortunately, it expands on the Portal story in several awesome ways that I won't spoil.

They've improved the graphics in some great ways also! Although when you're fiddling with the graphics options, you'll be told what they do every time... which is a bit irritating if you already know what they do!

The co-op adds a few more hours play also, the good thing is, with each person you co-op with, the levels have a certain freshness, I've discovered different solutions by playing with different people, the GLaDOS dialogue is different depending on which character you play as, and, it's just a whole lot of fun!

If Valve support the co-op as much as they do with TF2 (which I suspect they will) then this game will be packed with value for a while.

Now, episode 3 please Valve!

2 Years on from writing this review, I shall add that it hasn't recieved quite the same support as TF2, but by adding the workshop and map editor, they don't really need to as the community supports itself. Still waiting on HL2ep3 or HL3, but whatevs. Some more story based co-op content would be nice as they generally do a top job of that sort of thing. I should also mention that I've not played much workshop co-op in recent months because whenever I do, the quickplay function seems to break, which is moderately disappointing.

I'm in Space.

That's all you need to know about Portal 2.
A must have sequel to the Epic Portal saga. The multiplayer is a whole game in it self. Very well done.
Megérte rá várni. Akinek az első rész tetszett ezt imádni fogja!

Valve delivers again.

This is what you can call a AAA Title.

Great story, pacing and a Brilliant Co-Op Mode you will have hours and days and weeks and months and years of fun with this game.

Buy It NOW!

На голову выше первой части. 

Надеюсь, мы когда нибудь увидим продолжение под цифрой 3.
SPAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAACE!!!!!I'M IN SPACE!xD , No, seriously, get this game for the last scene, most epic rofls evar.
Goddamn amazing game, play it damnit.
It's pretty darn awesome. Get it asap.

ストーリー性のあるアクションパズルげー。
パズル難度は低い目で、パズルげーが得意ならさくさく解ける。
がちがちの難度を求めている人には全然物足りない反面、誰でもさくさく解ける爽快感は◎。
Portal1をプレイしていなくても楽しめる。プレイしているとストーリーのつながりがわかって面白くわくわくする。
初見同士がCOOPモードをプレイするとかなり盛り上がる。

+ If you liked the first, you'll love this one. Puzzles are challenging in the "I need to think this through" way, not "OH MY GOD I CAN'T MAKE THIS DAMN SHOT". Plot and dialogue is very amusing, and there's hidden things here and there that reward your powers of observation. Co-op is very fun to do with friends/significant others that haven't finished the co-op missions yet. 

- Minimal to no replay value, which especially hurts co-op. I definitely wouldn't want to do co-op with a stranger.

Great game with a single player that has a surprisingly good and very sharply written story worth the $50 alone. The co-op mode is devoid of the wonderful music in the single player but is a ton of fun too.
Game of the year. Now and forever.

GOTY, all years.

Well... at least of 2011.
RULES!!!
Awesome game, awesome story, good humor, good graphics, high re-playability. Pick up a copy, it's well worth the price.
EPIIIICCCC!!!! mehr gibts nich zusagen ^^ und ich glaub da stimmt mir jeder zu ^^
Recommended to any Portal fan & Co-op is just amazing on this game.
Pocos juegos consiguen hacerme llorar y sacarme una sonrisa al mismo tiempo. Portal 2: maravilloso. Gracias, VALVe. Gracias.
No exaggeration, this is the best game I have ever played.

TROP EXCELLENT ! Désolé je ne vois pas d'autres mots, tellement ce jeu est génial. 

Il y a l'humour comme on n'en voit jamais dans les jeux, une histoire unique et bien présente, des casses têtes a en devenir schizo... 
J'en bave tellement il est SUPEERRR !!!

A avoir absolument dans sa collection.
"I'm making a note here: Huge Success!"

Valve hry prostě umí a Portal 2 to jen dokazuje. Část pro jednoho hráče je naprosto famózní a podobně skvělý singleplayer jsem už dlouho nehrál. 
Co-op by pak byl úspěšný i sám o sobě. Není nic zábavnějšího než zrušit most pod kolegou a tím ho odsoudit k respawnu. Ehm.   
A GLaDOS se svým černým humorem opět boduje. 10/10 

'Je tam srnka, ale asi ji nevidíš. Běž blíž!'  Přiznejte se, kdo se na tohle nechal nachytat? :)

Better than the first, in my opinion. Excellent characters, neat backstory, fun puzzles, and the newer puzzle elements add more to the game without making it too complicated. The amount of work put into the co-op courses show too!

"Are you space?"
"Yes, now we are family again."
Mémorable : scénario palpitant et humour omniprésent.
Very fun, diferent from portal 1, but not to much, a must have

Get it.
NOW!
you don't get this game your a noob, if you have't played the 1st one your more of a noob :)
Incredible fun game. Great humour, great puzzles. MUST HAVE!
Portal 1 followed by portal 2 - work of pure genius, one of the best games ever made.
GLaDOS is back and she wants to test more than ever. Don't keep her waiting.
Loht sich genau so sehr wie Portal 1 und für einen Fan der Storry ein echtes Must-Have! Die Storry ist einfallsreich und lustig vortgesetzt und der Multiplayer bietet viel Spaß mit Freunden...

Best game ever..

I'm in SPAAAAAAACEEE
2 words --> BUY THIS!
if you liked the first one your love the second :)
Eu não tenho mais nada a dizer, do que só afirmar que realmente,é o melhor jogo do ano !!!

The most popular 1st person puzzler.
Single player is a little short, but great levels with tons of new featrure.
Coop is brand new, awesome experience game ever! Must try it (if you have a friend that 1st time player).
-----------------
前作を楽しんだ人には公式の傑作レベル集として50$以上の価値あり。ただ値段の割にプレイ時間が短いと発狂してしまう人は買ってはいけない。
The best game ever with hours of fun in single player and with a friend in co-op. Great story with an excellent ending.

前作は完璧に完成されていた作品だったので、続編が出ると聞いたときには、正直期待半分不安半分だった。
だけど、Valveは見事に期待に応えてくれた。
長期的に遊べるゲームでは無いかもしれないけど、それでも十分過ぎる内容に満足。
An excellent successor with fun new mechanics and great humour.

This game has been out for two and a half days, at the time of writing.
In that time, I have played through the full story mode (7 hours-ish) twice, and completed Co-op mode once. Seriously, if you are on the fence about this game, and not sure what to expect, take the jump. Valve are well known for producing incredibly high-quality games, and this is right up there.

It's hilariously written and designed. It's even really well optimised. I played at medium-high settings on a laptop, and it ran smoothly.

(Get a good co-op partner though, because if you can't work well together you will both get frustrated.)

Schöne lange und neue Story mit alten Bekannten wie BegleiterKubus und GLaDOS.
Der Ko-op Modus ist sehr interessant und spannend gestaltet, man muss im Team arbeiten, und es gibt extra Features, wie Gesten und neue Skins für die Roboter.
Portal 2 ist eins der besten Spiele die ich je gespielt habe. Es ist perfekt durchdacht und am liebsten mag ich den Multiplayer.^^
Get my cake for me...

Portal is back in business with an amazing storyline, great humor, stunning scenery and 80% less cake!

This is a "Must have game" if you loved the original Portal, and the world of Half-Life!
This is how sequels should be formulated - a game which actually makes you use your brain and have fun while doing it!
this game reminds me the Stanisław Lem's story.  very clever game design

I'm suffering from post-Portal depression :(
In all seriousness though, Valve somehow managed to make Portal 2 a thousand times more awesome than Portal. I didn't think it was possible.
Awesome...  as always.

I'll put this simply, and avoid spoilers: 
this game is everything any new game should be (like portal was), plus everything any squel to such a game should be. 

The character development and background is paradim-shifting, without making it untrue to the original.
Nice work Valve, ya dun good.
It's magical!

A must play whether you have already played the first Portal or not (though you should). An almost perfect mix of adventure, action, puzzle and humour with a deep storyline where twists and turns occur when you least expect it. It will leave you on the edge of your platforms (har har) throughout every chapter. The ending absolutely lives up to the expectations, it’s satisfying, it’s deep, it’s creepy, it’s witty and most of all... it’s weird. Get it and play it!
Portals, GLADOS and cake (may be a lie) what more can you ask for. Awesome game is awesome :D

where the devil is my rollcage?

otherwise, epic game!
the game that needs no recomendation.
Must Get NOW!

Magnificent. More than just a fitting sequel. More varied challenges and solutions, fantastic voice acting (with some hilarious, if barbed jokes). GlaDOS is in fine form, to say the least.

Play it. For science.

If you don't have this game, you're doing it wrong.  

By 'it' I obviously mean life.

You monster.
